mapper.select: SELECT ii.interface_id, ii.testcase_id, ii.is_execute, ii.DATA instance_data, ii.verification_type, ii.verification_context, ii.interface_instance_result, ii.save_result, ii.sort, t.NAME testcase_name, i.DATA interface_data, i.NAME interface_name, i.base_path, i.url interface_url, i.request_type FROM interface_instance ii LEFT JOIN testcase t ON t.id = ii.testcase_id LEFT JOIN interface i ON ii.interface_id = i.id where ii.testcase_id=#{id}
